     CV
  

      
I am Assistant Professor of Economics in University of Rouen-Normandy and member of Laboratoire d’Economie Rouen-Normandie (LERN).
My main research interests are macroeconomic dynamics (growth and business cycles), fiscal policies, market imperfections in labor markets and also fertility.
I am mainly teaching courses oriented toward topics in macroeconomics (either thematic or more technical courses).
I have been Head of Economic Department of University of Rouen from 2018 to 2022, and am co-responsible for the Master Advanced Applied Economics co-organized with University of Caen.
Do not hesitate to contact me at: nicolas.abad@univ-rouen.fr
